dublin_core.dcvalue: The implementation of Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act privacy and security provisions does not need to be a cause for panic among health care organizations A common sense approach that stresses documentation of policies and procedures for communication using technology such as in the case of providing telehome care takes agencies a long way towards HIPAA compliance
Caring : National Association for Home Care magazine
The technology-privacy conundrum. HIPAA perspectives for telehome care providers.
